class.name: OpenXRSpatialComponentMarkerList
class.brief_description: Object for storing the queries marker result data.
class.description: Object for storing the queries marker result data when calling [method OpenXRSpatialEntityExtension.query_snapshot].

method.name: get_marker_data
method.description: Returns either a [String] or a [PackedByteArray] buffer with data for the marker at this [param index]. Only applicable for QR code markers.

method.name: get_marker_id
method.description: Returns the marker ID for the marker at this [param index]. Only applicable for Aruco or April Tag markers.

method.name: get_marker_type
method.description: Returns the marker type for the marker at this [param index].

constants.constant: Marker based on a QR code.
Marker based on a micro QR code.
Marker based on an Aruco code.
Marker based on an April Tag.
